products.name: PLANET FRIENDLY BALLOTIN 500G
products.description: The Planet Friendly Ballotin (500G) contains +/- 44 iconic Neuhaus chocolates; a selection of praliné, ganache, gianduja and caramel filled pralines. We carefully select each ingredient, ensuring that every Neuhaus praline is of the highest quality and of 100% natural origin. All our products are made without GMOs and without palm oil.

products.name: TABLET MILK COOKIES 100G
products.description: The Planet Friendly Ballotin (500G) contains +/- 44 iconic Neuhaus chocolates; a selection of praliné, ganache, gianduja and caramel filled pralines. We carefully select each ingredient, ensuring that every Neuhaus praline is of the highest quality and of 100% natural origin. All our products are made without GMOs and without palm oil.

products.name: MILK CHOCOLATE BAR
products.description: A Milk Chocolate Bar - Crunchy Caramel (55G) with caramel and crunchy biscuits crafted with care by our Maîtres Chocolatiers to let you explore different tastes and textures.

products.name: TABLET DARK UGANDA 80% 100G
products.description: This Tablet Dark Uganda 80% (100G) reveals a full expression of robust and earthy tasting notes. The origin dark chocolate from Uganda typically shows a full-bodied yet balanced cocoa intensity, accompanied by bitterness and acidity. This rich and luscious tablet is lactose-free & vegan.

products.name: DARK CHOCOLATE SPREAD
products.description: Dark Chocolate Spread (200G) bursting with dark chocolate flavour and made with only the best cocoa. Spread the joy with this intense dark chocolate paste.

products.name: DARK CHOCOLATE BAR
products.description: A Dark Chocolate Bar - Hazelnut Praliné (50G) with a smooth hazelnut praliné and caramelized pieces from Spain and Italy crafted with care by our Maîtres Chocolatiers to let you explore different tastes and textures.

products.name: TABLET WHITE VANILLA 100G
products.description: A Tablet White Vanilla (100G) with a sweet and smooth white chocolate and hints of fresh vanilla from Madagascar.

products.name: WHITE CHOCOLATE BAR - MOCHA
products.description: A White Chocolate Bar – Mocha (53G) with a ganache and Italian ristretto coffee made with 100% Arabica coffee beans crafted with care by our Maîtres Chocolatiers to let you explore different tastes and textures.

products.name: THINS SEL DE GUÉRANDE
products.description: The Thins Sel de Guérande (114G) contains 11 ultrafine layered sea salt nougatine biscuits dipped in premium Belgium dark chocolate. Perfect to savour for those relaxing moments you allow yourself during the day.

products.name: PLANET FRIENDLY BALLOTIN 500G
products.description: The Planet Friendly Ballotin (500G) contains +/- 44 iconic Neuhaus chocolates; a selection of praliné, ganache, gianduja and caramel filled pralines.

products.name: TIMELESS MASTERPIECES BALLOTIN 500G
products.description: The TM Ballotin (500G) contains +/- 42 iconic Neuhaus chocolates; a selection of fresh cream, praliné, ganache and gianduja filled pralines.

products.name: BISCUITS PLAISIRS - AMOURETTO
products.description: The Biscuits Plaisirs - Amouretto box (200G) contains +/- 18 butter biscuits coated with dark Belgian chocolate, made according to a traditional recipe. In a romantic heart shape, they combine the delicate flavour of fresh butter with the intense flavour of dark chocolate and have a deliciously crunchy texture.

products.name: NEUHAUS COLLECTION IRRÉSISTIBLES
products.description: The Neuhaus Collection Irrésistibles Box (250G) contains a selection of 12 iconic Neuhaus Irrésistibles chocolates. A contemporary and elegant gift box with unique Belgian pralines made of traditional artisanal nougatine hand-filled with smooth fresh cream or ganache and coated with dark or milk chocolate.

products.name: NEUHAUS COLLECTION DISCOVERY
products.description: The Neuhaus Collection Discovery Box (266G) contains a selection of 24 timeless Neuhaus milk, dark & white filled chocolates. A contemporary and elegant gift box hand-filled with pralinés, ganaches and caramels.
